supreme_commander.name: Supreme Commander
supreme_commander.special: Strongest unit, defeated only by Spy when attacked.
supreme_commander.description: The overall commander of the war effort, directing all forces.

general.name: General
general.description: Commands entire divisions and coordinates large-scale operations.

colonel.name: Colonel
colonel.description: A seasoned battlefield officer in charge of regiments.

major.name: Major
major.description: Leads battalions and coordinates tactical maneuvers.

captain.name: Captain
captain.description: Company commander skilled at leading infantry units into combat.

lieutenant.name: Lieutenant
lieutenant.description: Junior officer responsible for leading platoons.

sergeant.name: Sergeant
sergeant.description: Veteran non-commissioned officer keeping troops in line under fire.

combat_engineer.name: Combat Engineer
combat_engineer.description: Carries specialized tools for clearing explosives and fortifications.

recon_scout.name: Recon Scout
recon_scout.special: Can move multiple spaces in a straight line.
recon_scout.description: Fast-moving reconnaissance unit skilled at spotting enemy positions.

field_spy.name: Field Spy
field_spy.special: Defeats the Supreme Commander when attacking.
field_spy.description: A covert agent capable of taking down the top brass when striking first.

command_flag.name: Command Flag
command_flag.description: Represents the army’s command structure — capture to secure victory.

land_mine.name: Land Mine
land_mine.special: Destroys any attacking unit except Combat Engineers.
land_mine.description: Hidden explosive trap that annihilates unsuspecting attackers.
